p: However, in the long history of grafting, exceptional interfamily grafting combinations have been observed [ 5–9]. We have also recently confirmed that exceptional grafting of Nicotiana species with plants from distant families is possible [ 10]. Nicotiana species established interfamily grafting with 38 other families. In Nicotiana interfamily grafting, apoplastic and symplasmic transports were established at 3 d after grafting or later, although the level of transport was not high. These observations indicate that tissue connections were partially reconstructed after cell-cell adhesion.
